definition: a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way

definition: If you work at it hard enough, you can grind an iron bar into a needle./cf idiom 磨杵成針|磨杵成针, to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle (idiom); fig. to persevere in a difficult task/to study diligently
pinyin: zhi3 yao4 gong1 fu5 shen1 , tie3 chu3 mo2 cheng2 zhen1
related.word: 只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针

definition: the matter depends on the individual (idiom); it is a matter for your own effort/With effort, one can achieve anything.
effort will undoubtedly lead to success (idiom)
the first step is the hardest (idiom)
every beginning is difficult (idiom)/getting started is always the hardest part

lit. When we get to the mountain, there'll be a way through. (idiom)/fig. Everything will turn out for the best./Let's worry about it when it happens./It will be all right on the night./cf couplet 車到山前必有路，船到橋頭自然直|车到山前必有路，船到桥头自然直

definition: you get what you put in/you reap what you sow

definition: planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.

definition: just as distance determines the stamina of a horse, so does time reveal a person's true heart (proverb)

related.word: 路遥知马力，日久见人心

definition: Failure is the mother of success.

definition: perseverance

definition: one cannot achieve glory and wealth without having been through trials and tribulations (proverb)/no pain, no gain
